review: Would be 5 Stars if twitch actually worked with it without a third party cast app. 60 FPS streams will not play properly and they stutter. This is not a wifi issue, as I stream other channels on twitch just fine. But if you watch a twitch streamer that has 60 fps1080, it will not work with Chromecast unless you get a third party cast app and cast from the URL.
author: CD CGO
